column1: The initial questions which arise in this application is also similar to the case bearing No.
CA/Writ/27/2022 and such questions are as follows;

column2: whether the Petitioner is entitled to declare the budget which was defeated by a
majority  as  duly  adopted  under  section  169  of  the  Act  based  on  the  alleged
reason that he had accepted the amendments proposed by Members,
whether the Petitioner is deemed to have resigned from the office of Chairman
as he failed to re-submit the budget for a vote after it was defeated.
